data.name: HOODESolver.jl
data.description: High Oscillatory Ordinary Differential Equation Solver (write in Julia language)

evidence: README indicates network usage: "The following is an example with the system of HÃ©non-Heiles. Please see the [documentation](https://pnavaro.github.io/HOODESolver.jl/stable/) for further usage, tutorials, and api reference."

"HOODESolver.jl is a registered package and can be installed using the Julia package manager. From the Julia REPL, enter Pkg mode (by pressing `]`) (@v1.5) pkg> add HOODESolver" (indicates distribution via Julia package registry).
"A Julia package for solving numerically highly-oscillatory ODE problems" and usage example `using HOODESolver` show it is imported as a library/dependency.
